name: Dragonfly – Advanced Live Search
author: 8webit

sections.description:
Dragonfly is live search plugin,that can search any post type or taxonomy.

Demo

Documentation

  • Supports WooCommerce

    Search WooCommerce product by SKU. Dragonfly Suggestion Builder supports to show Product Price,SKU or Stock Status

  • 3 Modes of Search

    • Classic – Simple & Universal
    • Fullscreen – Fullscreen Overlay.Multi Columns
    • Inline – Compact.Perfect For as Menu Item

  • Drag & Drop Suggestion Builder

    Build multi row/column suggestion layout for your needs.you choose what components to show and where.

  • Relevant Suggestions

    Shows suggestions by fuzzy keyword match

  • Customizer Everything

    Customize search field or suggestion color, font or border radius
